column3: Title
資產Assets
流動資產　Current assets
現金及約當現金 Cash and cash equivalents
透過損益按公允價值衡量之金融資產－流動 Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
按攤銷後成本衡量之金融資產－流動 Current financial assets at amortised cost
應收票據淨額 Notes receivable, net
應收帳款淨額 Accounts receivable, net
其他應收款 Other receivables
存貨 Current inventories
預付款項 Prepayments
其他流動資產 Other current assets
流動資產合計 Total current assets
非流動資產　Non-current assets
透過其他綜合損益按公允價值衡量之金融資產－非流動 Non-current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income
按攤銷後成本衡量之金融資產－非流動 Non-current financial assets at amortised cost
採用權益法之投資 Investments accounted for using equity method
不動產、廠房及設備 Property, plant and equipment
使用權資產 Right-of-use assets
投資性不動產淨額 Investment property, net
無形資產 Intangible assets
遞延所得稅資產 Deferred tax assets
其他非流動資產 Other non-current assets
非流動資產合計 Total non-current assets
資產總計　Total assets
負債及權益Liabilities and equity
負債　Liabilities
流動負債 Current liabilities
短期借款 Current borrowings
應付短期票券 Short-term notes and bills payable
透過損益按公允價值衡量之金融負債－流動 Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss
合約負債－流動 Current contract liabilities
應付票據 Notes payable
應付帳款 Accounts payable
其他應付款 Other payables
本期所得稅負債 Current tax liabilities
租賃負債－流動 Current lease liabilities
其他流動負債 Other current liabilities
流動負債合計 Total current liabilities
非流動負債 Non-current liabilities
合約負債－非流動 Non-current contract liabilities
應付公司債 Bonds payable
遞延所得稅負債 Deferred tax liabilities
租賃負債－非流動 Non-current lease liabilities
其他非流動負債 Other non-current liabilities
非流動負債合計 Total non-current liabilities
負債總計 Total liabilities
權益　Equity
歸屬於母公司業主之權益 Equity attributable to owners of parent
股本 Share capital
普通股股本 Ordinary share
股本合計 Total capital stock
資本公積 Capital surplus
資本公積－發行溢價 Capital surplus, additional paid-in capital
資本公積－認股權 Capital surplus, share options
資本公積合計 Total capital surplus
保留盈餘 Retained earnings
法定盈餘公積 Legal reserve
特別盈餘公積 Special reserve
未分配盈餘（或待彌補虧損） Unappropriated retained earnings (accumulated deficit)
保留盈餘合計 Total retained earnings
其他權益 Other equity interest
國外營運機構財務報表換算之兌換差額 Exchange differences on translation of foreign financial statements
其他權益合計 Total other equity interest
歸屬於母公司業主之權益合計 Total equity attributable to owners of parent
非控制權益 Non-controlling interests
權益總計 Total equity
負債及權益總計　Total liabilities and equity
預收股款（權益項下）之約當發行股數　Equivalent issue shares of advance receipts for ordinary share
母公司暨子公司所持有之母公司庫藏股股數（單位：股）　Number of shares in entity held by entity and by its subsidiaries
